product_name: Swiss Army Huntsman Wood Handle Knife
long_description: Versatile enough to be used around the house as well as out in the woods, the Swiss Army Wood Handle knife catches the eye with a distinctive hardwood handle with unique grains and colors. Stainless-steel implements include large and small blades, scissors, corkscrew, and large and small flat screwdrivers. Also has a can opener, bottle opener, wire stripper, reamer, tweezers, toothpick, parcel hook and wood saw.
short_description: Versatile enough to be used around the house as well as out in the woods, the Swiss Army Wood Handle knife catches the eye with a distinctive hardwood handle with unique grains and colors.
